description: This file contains CSS variables and styles for managing themes, specifically for an application interface. It includes definitions for light and dark theme colors, typography settings, and styles for components like the app header and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Root style for the app, defining text alignment, background color, and color based on theme variables.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the app logo including size and pointer events.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header, including layout, background color, and transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the app, specifying color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styling for the theme toggle, including position, background color, and hover effects.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Animation keyframes for spinning the app logo.
